item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for Delo, 1–4 December 2025 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Mediana for Delo, 1–4 December 2025 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Demokrati (EPP): 3.2–6.9%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 3.2–6.9%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (PfE): 2.9–6.4%
  • Prerod – Stranka Vladimirja Prebiliča (Greens/EFA): 1.9–4.8%
  • Stranka generacij (*): 0.3–1.9%
  • Gibanje Svoboda (RE): 19.4–26.6%
  • Mi, socialisti! (*): 1.2–3.7%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 3.4–7.1%
  • Glas upokojencev (*): 0.9–3.2%
  • Piratska stranka Slovenije (Greens/EFA): 1.4–4.2%
  • Resni.ca (NI): 4.1–8.2%
  • Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 24.4–32.1%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 6.1–10.8%
  • VESNA–Zelena stranka (Greens/EFA): 1.2–3.7%
  • Zeleni Slovenije (RE): 0.8–3.0%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 0.5–2.5%
  • FOKUS – za Slovenijo s ciljem (*): 0.4–2.2%
